div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimosexto
die mensis februarij Anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Walter Saiffray grantit him awand' to Johnne froster
xxtj d' of siluer to be pait within terme of law

The said day the court wardit schew for law and was giffin for dome
that meg Ramsay had failyeit in hir preif anent the clame of a pair of schetis
clamyt be Johnne nicholsone as day assignit tile hir to preif the said
actioun' was at summissioun' ffor the quhilkis scho was in amerciament of the court
and' aucht till ansuer peremptourlie for the wranguis' withhaldin of the said
schetis this Instant day

The said day Johne couper granit him awand' to Androw bawne iij s' and ix d'
quhilk he oblist him to pay betuix this and sonday or the sone gangto

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eisudme decimonono die mensis
februarij Anno quosupra

The said the bailyeis continewit the actioun' debatabile' betuix Allane litster and Robert
litster to friday that nixt cummys And' ale vdir actionis dependenad' to be decidit this
day in siclik strintht force and effect as thai ar now to the said friday

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo tercio die mensis februarij
Anno quosupra

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys till William King cordonare
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne arthour that wranguisly and aganis
the law the said Wilyeame has boucht four dakir of hiddis fra his caland' Robert
deauch' in mekile' Durnocht the said robert nocht maid his compt nor rekning with him

The said day ormond' leslie grantit him borgh' and dettour for thomas beid beildystoun'
to margaret Kintor the wif of alexander malisone for xvj s' of siluer quhilkis the sad
ormond' grantit him to pay or ger hir be pait within terme of lawe

The said day it was deliuerit be an suorne assis' Dunan fif forspekar that
Dauid lamb sale deliuer to Johnne of Kinto ane boll of maile within terme of law

The said day the bailyeis chargit Androw nauchtie officiar to bring Johnne cuk
this day xv dais to ansuer to Johnne litstar for viij s' of siluer And' failyeing
that he bring nocht the said Johnne he sall pay the said viij s'

The said day allane litstar on' that ane part and henry andersone on' that vdir part
referrit to thome Watsonis aitht gif the said allan promittit to the said henry
vj noblis for the li' g' in pament of vj barrellis of as' bocht fra the said henry

The said day alexander vilyeamsone Wobstar grantit him awand' to georg'
barbour viij s' of siluer to be pait within terme ter of law

The said day Allane litster warnit henry andersone to flit and deuoid'
him of ane loft and ane forbutht pertening to him at Witsonday nixt tocum
protestand' that gif he Remanit our the said terme that he mycht taxt maile on' him

The said day allane litster one that ane part And' henry andersone
andersone of one that vthir part oblist thaim be the faitht of thar bodijz
to stand' and abid' at the deliuerance of thomas Waus and Duncan colison'
for the part of the said allane and Johnne of cullan and Duncan fif for the
part of the said henry anent the clame of vj barellis of as' vij li'
of wax and vthir smale comptis clamit be the said henry And als that
the saide allane has to clame the said henry

The said day ser Androw colisone forpsekar for Allane litster Instant he requirit
henry andersone thane present and Johnne Watsone absent and his procuratouris gif
ony was to schaw and gif in writ ale gudis of airschip and vtheris quhilkis
thai had to clame the said allane' that pertenit to be follouit befor the prouost and
baillies of the said burgh' offering him reddy tile vndirly the law befor the said prouost
and balyeis as his Jugis ordinaris Protestand' gif thai wald' nocht persew the said
gudis as said' is that he myht be quyt of that chalang in tyme tocum

The said' day master Alexander lausone forpskear for henry andirsone allegit
that the said henry and Johnne' Watsone had clame to certane gudes of airschip
and lanndis pertening to thar wiffis in heritag quhilkis thai wald' persew quhen
the tyme requirit protestand' that thai mycht haue preuileg' tharto

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eisudem xxvjo die mensis februarij
Anno quo supra

Eodem die Jacobus colisoun thomas chamer Patricius leslie Senior Dauid
andersone andreas fyf alexander menyeis Dauid Kintor Richardus Waus gavinus
murray Dauid fynne Thomas Watsone Duncanus fyf Johannes Kintor Willelmus
murray et Cristinus prat Juratj dicunt quod quondam Jacobus Wormet frater mariote
Wormet latricis presencium obijt ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis Et quod dicta
mariota est legittima et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Jacobj fratris suj ceterj
punctj breuis patent in se qui non sunt terre neque annuj redditus

The said day robert litster failyeit in the deposicioun' of his aitht gevin tile
him be ane assis' that he bade Alane litster pay to ser Adnrowe colison vj s'
of annuele o for him for the quhilkis he was adiugit to pay the vj s' to the said
Allane'

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis' assignit friday that nixt cummys to Robert
lister to ansuer' to the borgh' fundin one him be Allane litster for the wranguis'
Intrometting with xxiiij s' or tharby scottis money or tharby in tyme of the said allanis
wiffis seiknes pertenyng to him

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoseptimo die
mensis februarij Anno quosupra

The said Kelly duelland' in the gardin has tane to preiwe on' mononday that
nixt cummys that the actioun' debatabile betuix him and ane seruand' of thomas
cummyngis is bundin till Arbatry be the fathis of thar bodijs

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis februarij marcij Anno quosupra

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to Johnne' andirson'
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be nichol baxter for the wrnaguis' withhaldin
fra him of thre punyeone of lamskinnis as he that was merchand' to him

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to gilbert tulideff
tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne arthour for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of ane potyr plait

The said day robert litster offerit him redy tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be Alane litstar fo the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxiiij s' or tharby
eftir the tenour of the act' gangand befor Ande the said alane beand present refusit the
to follou said borgh'

The said day It is was deliuerit be ane suorn assis' Johnne cullan for
spekar that patry chernsid sale deliuer ane end of Irne weyand ane stane to
robert hile to releif him at the handis of Johnne Arthour'

The saide day Willaime harpar granit him awand' to androwe tailyeour the
quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The said day it was sufficientlie preuit that mag ramsay sale pay to Johne
nicholsone v s' for ane payr of schetis within xv dais hereftir

The said day niniane cummyng grantit that he had ane collar of franche
brovne pertenand to Dauy steuartis wif Ande Johnne of meldrum come
souerte tile entir him one mononday that nixt cummys

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis marcij Anno quosupra

The said Wilyeame Kelly failyeit in his preif anent the actioun' persewit be
Robertsone seruitour to thomas cuming anent the clame fo xvij s' for
ane hous ffor the quhilkis the said Wilyeame was in amerciament of the
court and aucht to pay the said xvij s' within terme of law

The said day adam sawar lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit
tile haue ansuerit for the wranfuis' wtihaldin of ane ax fra James Wricht
in amerciament of the court in defalt of presens tharfor the bailyeis gef androw nachtj officiar' in
command' to pas' and warne the said adam again this day viij dais

The said day the borgh' fundin one Johne andirsone be nichol baxter for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of iij punyeonis of skinnis was fundin of nain availe as it was
strikin be ane suorne assis' Willeame murray forspekar'

The said day the bai Johnne low smyth grantit him awand' to Johne Androw stratoun'
xiiij s' of siluer for Sandy chamer in Tirj quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of lawe

The said day the prouest ballieis and Counsale ordanit and diuisit ane propyn'
in wyne wax and Spice to my lord of abirdene as eftir follouis In the
first tua puncionis of wyne cost nyne li' and iiijor s' to cary tham to my
lordis place Item iiij peter wax price of the stane xviij s' maid' in torchis and
prikatis for the makin' of thame iij s' for the treis makyn and savin xviij d'
for tua Rauchteris to be the treis xx d' for wekis xviij d' Item ij dusane
of scorcheatis price xlviij s' demy galloune of maluasy price iiij s' viiij d' ane
gallone of claret v s' iiij d' and demy gallone of quhit wyne price ij s' to be pait
of the Rediast gudis of the toun Some of the haile xvj li' iij s' and viij d'

Curia Balliuorum Burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem nono die
menis marcij Anno quo supra

The said day patry russel has tane to preyve one the lawe day eftir pasche
that sandy rany is awand' to him ix s'

The said day george tailyeour requirit the aldirman and bailyeis that he mycht haue ly
naris to lyne the land betuix him and the ayris of William rolland'

Honorabiles domini preposite et balliuj opidi de Abirdene Coram vobis ego magister Andreas
patersone vicarius chori ecclesie cathedralis Abirdonensis presento et delibero hanc prolem Alexandrum
King paruulum filium quondam alexandri King defuncti cum suis Juribus patrius siue fratribus
patris dicte prolis videlicet alexandro King et Alexandro malysone burgensibus de abirdene personaliter
et
hic presentibus offerens me nunc Coram competenti Judice ad reddendum compotum et
raciocinium de bonis dicte proles Petens michi fieri alloca communem et solucionem de dictis
bonis suis pro sustentacione huismodi prolis pro tempore quinque annorum preteritorum mecum videlicet
pro quolibet anno quinque annorum preterito sex marcas monete scocie Protestando quod tho
mas Meldrum vtritus dicti paruuli nec ego nostri heredes executores nec assigna
tur non fuerimus compulsi nec coacti aut molestati in personis rebus nec terris in
postrum ad reddendum compotum nec raciocinium de aliquibus bonis aut he rebus eiusdem
prolis si nunc dicti alexander king et alexander malysone burgenses aut alij inter esse
habentes refutaueruit aut pro se qui noluerint dictum thomam meldrum et me
nunc offerentem Juri parens Ex eo quod facio diligenciam ad exonerandum nos de
bonis et omni clameo eius ac inter esse habencium prout Jura volunt Preterea protestor quod
proles non fuerit nunc recepta a me sed remanserit mecum post hac quod soluat et
satisfaciet eadem proles suj factores et heredes michi heredibus executoribus aut assignatis
meis pro quolibet die futuro de sex denariis monete scocie pro sustentacione sua
Et quod dictus thomas meldrum nec ego respondebo heredes executores nec factores
nostri vlterius pro vliis bonis dicte prolis Insuper requiro vos alexandrum King patruum
paruuli alexandri King presentis tanquam tutorem legittimum huius paruuli ad recipiendum
a me eundem paruulum cum bonis suis quem cum suis bonis quantum de Jure nunc
offero me deliberaturum secundum Juris ordinem Quod sibi remieritis facere
ait Iam me prosequj nolueritis protestor iterum solemniter hic Coram Judice
sedens protribunali quod neque ego neque heredes mei executores aut assig
tenementa terre nec possessionis teneamur vobis aut dicto
alexandro King paruulo suis heredibus executoribus aut assignatis nec quibus
aliis de huismodi bonis in posterum respondere quin eciam expense ipsius alexandri
King paruuli per me fact' super eum longe bona eius excedunt extendunt Et
hus honorabilis domine Judex vestrum peto decretum et cetera

The said' day mastir Androw patirsone one that ane part and Alexander King one that vthir
part oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' at the decret and ordi
nance of thir personis anent Compt rekning and pament of ale gudis pertening to
Sandy king sone and ayr' to vmquhile Alexander King his brothir that is to say Jonhne
mar' and patry rede chosin be the saide Alexander King as tutour to the said his brothir
sone and William Wormet and James Colisone chosin be the saide mastir Androw

The said day thir personis vnder writin has boucht thir witalis eftir foloving as Is
writin one thar Namez' fra Williame halkarstone burges of Edinburgh' ffor
the pament of the quhilkis Sovmez' the said personis has causit gilbert Menyeis
prouest of the said burgh' to be bundin and' oblist to the said' Williame be his lettrez'
obligatouris ffor the pament of the said Sovmez' eftir foloving that is to say tho
mas buchane for the Sovme of viij li' for ane chaldir of ry iiij li' for half
ane last of maslawe and xij s' for ane barrel of ry meyl Donald baxter
for the Sovme of iiijor li' for half ane chaldir ry Johnne baxtar cannyis sone
iiij bollis of ry xl s' Thomas straloche xij bollis ry vj li' Mage baxtar
ij bollis ry xx s' Dovny stane baxtar half ane chaldir ry iiijor li' Sandy
Donaldsone iiij bollis ry xltj s' Sandy coupar ane bole ry x s' William
mar ij bollis ry xxtj s' Johnne mar vj bollis ry iij li' Ande iij barrellis of mas
lawe xl s' Richerd redhed viij bollis ry iiij li' the prouestis modir iiij bollis
ry xl s' Androue gordoun xij bollis ry vj li' Thomas vmfray iiij bollis
Ry xl s' ffor the pament of the quhilkis Ilkane of the said personis ob
list thame be the faithtis of thar bodijs thar handis wphaldin to pay
the aid Sovmez of money to the said prouest betuix this ande mydsomir
nixt to cum To the frething and' releving of him at the said Williamis
handis

Eodem die Nicholaus baxtar fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit matheum branche
suum legittimum procuraotrem Actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem suam legittimam potesta
tem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum plegium aliis per eum
porrectum super Johannem Andirsone pro iniusta detencione ab eo vnius' pvnyeone
pellium agnorum Agendum defendendum respondendum Promittens de Rato et grato

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die marcij
anno quo Supra

The saide day Adam sawar' grauntit ane ax' of James Wrichtis quhilk
the balyeis ordanit and chargit him to deliuer to the said James within terme
of law

The saide day comperit Richerde litstar and dischargit him of the lande quhilk
he hede in tak of marioun' lundoris the relict of vmquhil William philp
becaus' it was Ruinous' and ane part fallin done and ane vthir part habile to to fall
done

The saide day Malcum crag tuk to preiwe one friday that next Cumis
that cristj prat dischargit him of Sex pundis and tuk Johne arthour dettour for
the pament of the samyn

The said' day thomas buchan grauntit him avande to ser Dauid Waus
vij s' and iiij d' for ane yerd maile to be pait at the next Witsonday

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johne arthour to
ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Cristy prat for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of Sex li' vsuale money of Scotland be the tenour of his
avne writ writin with his avne hande in his buk quhilk he sulde haue pait
him at fasternevin last bigan and discernit the copy of the said borghe to the
saide Johne one his expens'

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gewin for
dome that William Colp had' preuit Sufficientlie that dericht Skippar
prmottit to W him twa prewis' stane of lynt for his Coket

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die marcij
anno quo Supra

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit this day xv dais to John
frostar to bring the tailyouris scheir' clamit be patry huchosone befor tham
gif it came be gottyne or ellis to preiwe that ye he bocht it lauchfullie
Eodem die Robertus murray Amerciatur in defectu presencie

Eodem die cristinus prat et Johannes arthouris testes asserti malcomj crag
amerciantur in defectu presencie

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the Prouost bailyeis and counsaile
that na maner of persone nor personis by na merchandice that happinnis to cum be sey
francheman or ony vthiris vnto the tyme the price be maid be prouost and counsaill or
ellis to haue fre licence of the towne to sell thar gudis to quhom' thai pleis'
vndir the pain of fourty schillingis vnforgevin

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio burgi eiusdem decimonono
die mensis marcij Anno quosupra

Eodem die Andreas lousone fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordaind suum
filium carissimum magistrum Dauid lousone et Elizibetht blinseile sponsam suam
suos veros legittimos et indubitatos procuratores actores factores in omnibus
et singulis suis actionibus placitis et querelis contra coram quibuscumque personis
Promittens se Ratum gratum et cetera Cuius potestate sub se g substituendum vnum vel
plures qui consulem habeant potestatem sicut dicti suj procuratores

Eodem die cristinus prat fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem leslie de Warderis suum
verum et legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem dans et concedens eidem ac suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam
liberam potestatem ad prosequendum Johannem arthour pro sex li' monete scocie ac in omnibus aliis actionibus
et causis ipsum concernendum Agendum prosequendum defendendum promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

The said day the prouest and balyeis assignit the hed' / Court of the saide burghe next
eftir pasche to Johne Colisone tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Robert Waus
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of iij bollis of beir' for the maile of ane croft

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimotercio
die mensis marcij Anno quosupra

The said day the bailyeis ordanit henry reid' to bring testimoniale that he is dependand'
in the law befor the commissar of Aberdene anent the clame of certan woll that was
castin out of the barg pertenyng to Symon Ellone on' mononday that nixt cummys And
falyeing tharof to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be mathou branche for the frething
and releving of him of vj stanis of woll and a half .

The said day the Bailyeis chargit malcome crag to pay Wilyeame colp tua'
sprois' stane of lynt optenit apone Dericht skippar eftir the tenour of the act maid
tharapone obefor

The said day margaret crag douchtir and ayr tile vmquhile henry crag and
robert hile hir spous grantit thame fullelie content and pait of all gudis of ar
schip barnispart of gudis and vdir gudis pertenyng to hir be deces' of vmquhile
henry crag hir fadir and Willeame crag hir brodir Of the quhilkis thai hold'
thaim weil content and content pait be the handis of Dauid fynne his fadir in the law
And dischargis and quietclamis the said Dauid his ayris executouris and assignais
for thame thar ayris executouris and assignais now and foreuire

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eisudem vicesimosexto
die mensis marcij Anno quosupra Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to henry reid'
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be mathow branche for the releving
of him of vj stanis of woll and demy at the handis of Symon' Ellone'

The said day malcome crag and cristofer prat oblist thame be the fathis of thar
bodiis coniunctlie and seueralie tile Johnne Arthour to deliuer to him his obligacioun of
pundis quhilk Dericht skippar has of his betuix this and michelmes hereftir or thaim
ane sufficient acquitance betuix this and the said tyme And failyeing tharof to pay
to the said Johnne sex pundis scottis money quhilkis he pait to the said cristy

The said day Dauid Kintor Complenyeit to the Prouost and bailyeis of the said burgh'
that ser Johnne ruthirford had cumin to his maling of gilchomstone one Settirday
was viij dais and hundit his scheip and lammys witht his doggis and wald nocht
lat thame bid' within his avin malin and chassit thame to his durris And als the
said ser Johnnez' doggis was hundit in his presence at the said Dauidis scheip and lammis
obefor And als the said ser Johnne' and Sande his sone had strikin his seruandis
and takin his muk fra his seraundis and gert bring his creillis with his muke
and teynit thame Quhilkis the saide knycht and his sone denyit And grantit the
teinyng of the creilis and denyit the wrang And thareftir with consent of baitht the
said partijs the said actionis was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' of this personis vndir
writin that is to say Johnne colisone Dauid andersone robert Crag William' futhes
Willeame murray androue stratone androw harkar androw stevinsone Johnne'
Watsone Symone Ellone James gourlay alexander gray youngar thomas meldrum
Dauid straloche and androw litster quhilkis riplie auisit the greit aitht suorne
the allegacionis of baitht the said partijs sene and' vnderstandin and the preiffis
producit / fand' and delieurit be the mouetht of the said Johnn colisone forspekar of
the said Assis' the said ser Johnne ruthirfurd' quyt of the hundin of the said Dauidis
scheip and lammis And he and his sone was maid' quyt of the strikin of his seruandis
and ale actionis forsaid And anent' the teinyng of the said muk out of the said
Dauidis creillis the said assis' assignit the law day eftir pasche to the said knycht
to bring sufficient document that the said ground' quhar the said muk lay is
processit be him And that being done he is quyt of the wrang of the said muk'

The said daye ser Johnne ruthirfurde allegit that Dauid Kintor seruandis ande gudis
hade skathit ande distroyt his Corne' tymis bigane in greit quantite Ande the
saide Dauide saide and allegit that the skath done to the said ser Johnne vas amendit
Ande quhair' it was nocht amendit he sulde amend' It

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurde miles Inuenit Alexandrum menyheis plegium legalem
per manus sue ostensionem quod Dauid Kyntor erit indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dictus Dauid Inuenit matheum branche plegium legalem per manus sue ostensionem
quod dictus Dauid erit indempnis pro eodem Dauid aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus matheus
deuenit plegius legalis quod Idem d alexander ruthirfurd' erit indempnis pro dicto Dauid Aliter
quam per viam Juris et prefatus miles deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Dauid erit in
dempnis pro eodem Alexandro filio suo aliter quam per viam Juris Et dicte persone
obligabant se ad conseruandum suos plegios indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

The said daye the prouest ande bailyeis chargit ande ordanit that Androu michaelsone
sall haue passage throu the ende of the yhard' betuix hime ande Thomas
meldrum eftir the tenour' of the deliuerance gevin tharapone ande that passinge salbe
maide of the vidnes' that tuasum may pas' throw It to the loch with ane' barrow
and' entir a' agane in necessar tymis according to thair labour And' that Ilkane
of thame sal keip vthiris skaithles and' thair gudis at vsche ande entray of the
said' passagis according to Justice

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eisudem pennultimo
die mensis marcij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said day Androu Johnesone' fischear in futy was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd' forspekar for the strublance of Johnne' thomsone
quhit fischear and tile amend' as law will and forber in tyme in tocum And'
the said Johnne thomsone was maid' quyt be the said assis' of ale strublance
of the said Androu Jhonsoun'

The said day Andro Jhonsone was in amerciament of the court and conuikit
be the said assis' be the moutht of the said ser Johnne' ruthirfurd for wranguis'
reset of Will Juniour' and haldin of him fra gilbert mneyis prouostis seruice

The said day Wil Junior' was conuikit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne'
ruthirfurd forspekar for the wranguis' remaning fra gilbert menyeis prouostis
seruice and labour in his bait in futy And' atour the said assis' ordanit the
said Wilyame to find' Souerte

The saide day the Bailyeis assignit friday the gild' court day nixt
eftir the fest of pasche to Duncan fif to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him
be androu Edindeoche for the wranguis' withaldin fra him of
eftir the tenour of the borgh' giffin to the said Duncan tharapone

The said day Johnne' andirsone alias lochhillis was conuikit be the assis' forsaid'
for the forstalling of robert moyses in the bying of twa skynnis ffor the quhilkis
he was in amerciament of the court and to deliuere the said tua skinnis again to the
said robert of the price that he mycht haue boucht thaim first of

The said day It was ordanit be the said assis' that Alexander burnat sal mak
compt reknyng and pament to Dovny Wilman burges of Edinburgh' of fyve
hiddis siclik as clas' spyning' sellit thame And the said Donald' to gif
the said alexander ane power to follou the said hiddis fra the Intromettouris
witht the sammyn
